project_descr: Contributing to the Strengthening Enforcement of Law, Access to Justice and Social Integration Programme this Project focuses on supporting reforms in the prisons sector in Sri Lanka.

outputs.output_descr: Support prison reforms to contribute to strengthening coordination&systems between justice sector actors in select area models,improve prisoners access to systematized legal aid services&dispute resolution mechanisms& strengthen institutional capacities.
